item.title: One Year After Buying a Gym Membership - The Results so Far
item.description: One year ago I decided to pay for a gym membership and get myself back in shape.

item.title: Visualization gives you wings - why you should add it to your fitness routine
item.description: “The man who has no imagination has no wings.” ~ Muhammad Ali You’ve heard the stories of champions who attribute their success to visualization.
